articles.content:
THE way we see different images and solve puzzles can reveal a lot about our personalities. 
In fact, simply looking at this word puzzle personality test can reveal whether you are a natural leader … [+1944 chars]

articles.author: George Simpson
articles.title: Next James Bond: Peaky Blinders star Cillian Murphy's odds slashed gaining on Tom Hardy - Express
articles.description: NEXT JAMES BOND odds have seen Peaky Blinders star Cillian Murphy's odds slashed by 60 per cent, as he gains on frontrunners Regé-Jean Page, Henry Cavill, Aidan Turner and Tom Hardy.
